[ before noun ]
  biology, medical
  formal or specialized relating to the sides of an object or plant or to sideways movement: lateral movement Trim the lateral shoots of the flower (= the ones that grow sideways from the main stem of a plant).
phonetics
  specialized A lateral consonant is made when the flow of air is blocked in the middle, so that the air flows to the side: In English, /l/ is lateral.
